results.content:
On some projects the explanations were not accurate. In particularly when he was talking about jQuery. For example video 71 at 1:30 mark he says $(document).find(".quizContainer > .question");  is a condition = .quizContainer greater than .question that is NOT what that means.
There are a LOT of examples like this throughout the course. Luckily I did my research on the side, but that is not what you expect from a "Complete beginners" class. Pretty disappointed.
